item.title: EP 53 - Crazy Cryptid Week: The Pope Lick Monster
item.itunes:title: Crazy Cryptid Week: The Pope Lick Monster
item.description:
Today we talk about the heat and whether or not it brings the restless spirits of the damned back to life, and then we finish of Crazy Cryptid Week with the Pope Lick Monster.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Gary Parsons, the paranormal "expert" is claiming that rising temperatures in Britain is bringing out the ghosts. Why? Well, even he doesn't know. But it's a good way to drum up business for himself I guess. Also we discuss why ghosts wear clothes!

Then we travel to Kentucky to explore the legend of the Pope Lick Monster. Is he the only cryptid with a confirmed body count? Where did he come from? And more importantly: why is he half-sheep?

Links:

Who You Gonna Cool?

https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/6953263/uk-heatwave-ghosts-paranormal-activity/

The Pope Lick Monster Is No Mere Urban Legend - He Has An Actual Body Count

https://www.ranker.com/list/pope-lick-monster-urban-legend/laura-allan

Pope Lick Monster

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pope_Lick_Monster

Pope Lick 'monster' survivor 'mentally crushed'

https://www.courier-journal.com/story/news/local/2016/05/05/pope-lick-monster-survivor-says-charges-unfair/83840134/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
